main.name: Jason Lopez
main.bio: I'm hooked on startups. Passionate about sales, technology, and hospitality/travel. I love building things - companies, teams, processes, websites, apps, pretty much anything out of wood. I enjoy learning new skills and honing existing ones. Personal growth is something I strive for daily, trying my best to live by the 1% rule where you aim to improve/grow just 1% every day. My wife says I'm addicted to self-help ðŸ˜…. I mainly create content around sales, sales operations, go to market strategy, leadership, hospitality, and tourism. Hobbies include traveling, woodworking, chess, golf, gardening, and reef-keeping (I keep several saltwater aquariums) to name a few.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for a free consultation!

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Helping founders navigate startup life. 9 out of 10 startups fail within 5 years. Reasons may include lack of runway/capital, product-market fit, competition, lack of research, ineffective marketing, the team, the business model, a million other reasons or any combination of them. With every new client, my goal is to empower them to take ownership over their systems and processes so that they walk away not only with results, but with skills and a plan to supercharge their next phase of growth.

work.title: Director of Sales
work.description: $0 to $2m ARR in 4 months. Hospitality Tech company empowering short-term rental hosts to scale quickly and 'WOW' guests. Led initiatives developing and/or revamping sales strategy, go-to-market strategy, competitor analysis, lead generation, demand generation, messaging & scripting, hiring/onboarding/training, compensation planning, sales operations, insights, forecasting, and fund raising.

work.title: C0-Founder and CRO
work.description: Boutique travel agency specialized in corporate travel, groups, and honeymoons. Over $1m in sales first year in business. Led strategic initiatives around B2B client aquisition and retention, marketing, forecasting, and revenue operations.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
